page.description: The <OBJECT>.MENUITEMCHECK() method sets or removes the checkmark next to a menu entry in a menu loaded by a form or browse.

argument.name: menuitem
argument.description: The text of a menu entry.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example removes the checkmark from the Allow Edits entry in the Form menu.
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.show() ptr.MenuItemCheck("Allow Edits", .F.)
